name: GlucoseTestsInVenousBloodCapillaryBloodSerumplasmaForDiabetes
title: Glucose tests in venous blood, capillary blood, serum/plasma for Diabetes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for the challenge and non-challenge measurement of Glucose in venous blood, capillary blood, or serum/plasma used in the diagnosis and monitoring of diabetes.),(Data Element Scope: Any observation data element which references Glucose tests in venous blood, capillary blood, serum/plasma, both challenge and non-challenge.),(Inclusion Criteria: Glucose tests in venous blood, capillary blood, serum/plasma, challenge and non-challenge, including point of care tests.),(Exclusion Criteria: Glucose tests on specimens other than Glucose tests in venous blood, capillary blood, serum/plasma, challenge and non-challenge.)
